name: The Great Ladakh Road Trip (20th – 29th June 2014)
description: A Ladakh Road Trip that will make you drive on the most beautiful roads in the world as you reach the heart of the Buddhist Land of Ladakh. With RLT the fun takes new heights as you camp besides the beautiful Pangong Lake and cross the world’s highest motorable road to ride the double humped camels in the Nubra Valley. Life indeed is great…!!
